```{r}
library(cellWise)
dat = genevar()
x = dat$x
group = dat$group
```


```{r fig.width= 10}

cellMap(fit1$remX, fit1$stdResid, columnlabels = c(1,rep(" ",18),200), rowlabels = c(1,rep(" ",98),100), columnangle = 0,
        rowtitle = "Observations", columntitle = "Genes", sizetitles = 2,adjustrowlabels = 0.5, adjustcolumnlabels = 0.5)
```
